response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to us, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its worth to you stands at $800,000, we believe this represents an opportunity for mutual benefit. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at a price that reflects its true value and significance to both parties. Our offer is set at $950,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
